Title: Relates to extending provisions of law relating to the New York state adult cystic fibrosis program
Summary: Relates to extending provisions of law relating to the New York state adult cystic fibrosis program until 2030.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 769 of the laws of 2023, amending the public health law relating to the adult cystic fibrosis assistance program, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
